settings.description: Connect to your Home Assistant instance to control lights.
settings.token-hint: Create a Long-Lived Access Token at Profile > Security in Home Assistant.
settings.favorite-light-hint: Select the light to control by default and show in the bar widget.
settings.visible-lights-hint: Select which lights to show in the widget. Drag the handle to reorder. If none are selected, all lights will be shown.
settings.no-lights-connect: Connect to Home Assistant to see available lights.

show-only-on.label: Show only lights that are on
show-only-on.description: When enabled, only lights that are currently on will be shown in the panel.

tooltips.lights-on:
{count} of {total} lights on
Click to control
tooltips.all-off:
All lights off

panel.settings-hint: Configure connection in Settings > Plugins > Home Assistant Lights
panel.no-lights-hint: Make sure you have light entities in Home Assistant
